preserving_seat.description: Preserving the print or color of the seat by applying a protective layer on the seat.

sanitize_seat.description: Sanitizing the seat of the folding chair.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat of the folding chair.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat of the folding chair.

sanitize_fixed_leg.description: Sanitizing the leg of the folding chair which is fixed.

clean_leg.description: Clean the leg of the folding chair which is fixed.

rearranging_revolute_leg.description: Rearranging the position of the leg of the folding chair.

sanitize_revolute_leg.description: Sanitizing the leg of the folding chair which is revolute.

rotate_leg.description: Rotate the leg of the folding chair.

clean_leg.description: Clean the leg of the folding chair which is revolute.

sanitize_whole_chair.description: Sanitizing the entire folding chair including the seat, and legs.

preserving_whole_chair.description: Preserving the print or color of the chair including seat, and legs.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire folding chair including the seat, and legs.
